ğŸ‘‹ Hello, *{name}!*

Welcome to *SteelBike* â€” electric bike rental service.

By clicking the Â«I agreeÂ» button, you confirm that you have fully read, understood and accept the terms of the User Agreement and its Appendix. This action has legal force and is equivalent to your personal signature.

en.thanks_start:
ğŸš€ *Thank you for confirmation!* Let's start registration.

This will only take a few steps and will ensure the security of your account.

ğŸ“± *Step 1:* Share your contact for verification.

ğŸ“… *Step 3:* Enter your date of birth (DD.MM.YYYY).

ğŸ™ï¸ *Step 4:* Confirm your work city.

en.passport_main_ru:

en.passport_main_foreign:
ğŸ“¸ *Step 6:* Send a photo of your main document.
_International passport (main page) or ID card (front side)._
en.passport_reg_ru:
ğŸ“¸ *Step 7:* Send a photo of the registration page.
_If there is no registration, send any passport photo._

_If international passport, send any document photo or skip._
en.patent_front:
ğŸ“„ *Step 8:* Send a photo of work patent (front side).
_If you don't have one, click the button below._
en.patent_back:
ğŸ“„ *Step 9:* Send a photo of patent (back side).
_If you don't have one, click the button below._

_If you don't have one, click the button below._
